ğŸŒŸ Introduction to Elasticsearch Architecture #

Elasticsearch is a powerful, distributed search and analytics engine. Below are its core components:

  • Cluster: A group of nodes that store data and handle requests.
  • Node: An individual server within a cluster.
  • Index: A logical namespace for storing related documents.
  • Document: A JSON object representing a data entry.
  • Shard: A partition of an index that enables scalability.
  • Replica: A copy of a shard for redundancy and high availability.
